first double_crochet 42 chain 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet counts as decdc dcdec x 5 join with slip_stitch to first double_crochet and fo white 6 use a tapestry needle to weave in all ends make a pompom i used green but feel to mix this up if you want and secure to the tip of the hat © this pattern is for personal use only you have permission to sell dragonbird creations any items you
